title: Collusion breaks down when new firms enter

content.question: A collusive agreement to fix prices among firms in an oligopolistic industry is most likely to be broken under which of the following conditions?

choices.label: It is easy for new firms to enter into the industry.
All of the firms have identical costs.
The number of firms is few.

content.answer: It is easy for new firms to enter into the industry.
